text: <@U0W7D64LC> guess wrong mentioning - I'm trying follow up on all tech discussions but not sure that I'm the right person to contact in case of WG questions :wink:

<@U2T0BK7FG> - apologies for the delayed response - <@U0MRY2LKY> thanks for flagging - it would be great if you'd like to work on the use cases - the inventory is listed off of this page (along with the mailing list) - <https://wiki.hyperledger.org/groups/requirements/requirements-wg>
<@U2T0BK7FG> - there are needs in different aspects of the use cases - what did you have in mind or were interested in tackling?

purpose: Collect and document use cases and develop requirements for blockchain technology. Please see https://wiki.hyperledger.org/groups/requirements/requirements-wg for information about the Requirements Working Group.
text: <@U14KZA474|jeremysevareid> set the channel purpose: Collect and document use cases and develop requirements for blockchain technology. Please see https://wiki.hyperledger.org/groups/requirements/requirements-wg for information about the Requirements Working Group.
The most recent meeting minutes are here: <https://wiki.hyperledger.org/groups/requirements/requirements-wg/minutes#october_24h>
<@U2T0BK7FG> <@U0ULQ2G5V> is the slack handle for Oleg Abdrashitov, who leads the WG
